ModMetaData.name: Husko's Single Plant Textures
ModMetaData.author: Husko
ModMetaData.description: Patches plants from mods to only use 1 texture. Should even give a performance boost. Supported: VGP Garden Medicine (dismarzero.vgp.vgpgardenmedicine) VGP Vegetable Garden (dismarzero.vgp.vgpvegetablegarden) Vanilla Plants Expanded (vanillaexpanded.vplantse) Vanilla Plants Expanded - More Plants (vanillaexpanded.vplantsemore)
